user_query: I want to calculate the basal metabolic rate, body fat percentage, and daily caloric needs for different individuals.

TaskList.description: Calculate the basal metabolic rate (BMR) for a male weighing 60 kg and measuring 175 cm.
Determine the body fat percentage for a 27-year-old female weighing 78 kg and measuring 165 cm.
Calculate the daily caloric needs for a sedentary person weighing 60 kg, measuring 170 cm, and aged 30.
